sentence.Network_en: This provision gives the president total and unchecked power.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条规定赋予了总统绝对及不受约束的权力。

sentence.Network_en: Local authority nursery provision covers only a tiny minority of working mothers.
sentence.Network_cn: 当地政府提供的保育服务只有少数上班族母亲才能够享受到。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'foresight'): via Old French from Latin provisio(n-), from providere 'foresee, attend to' (see provide). The verb dates from the early 19th cent

entry.def: The provision of something is the act of giving it or making it available to people who need or want it.

example.ex: The department is responsible for the provision of residential care services.
example.tran: 该部门负责提供家庭护理服务。

example.ex: ...nursery provision for children with special needs.
example.tran: 为有特殊需要的儿童提供护理

entry.tran: 预备；准备；预先采取的措施
entry.def: If you make provision for something that might happen or that might need to be done, you make arrangements to deal with it.

example.ex: Mr King asked if it had ever occurred to her to make provision for her own pension...
example.tran: 金先生问她是否曾想过要为自己的养老金预先作安排。

example.ex: There is no provision for funding performance-related pay rises.
example.tran: 没有为与业绩挂钩的加薪预作资金准备。

entry.def: If you make provision for someone, you support them financially and make sure that they have the things that they need.

example.ex: Special provision should be made for children...
example.tran: 应给孩子在经济上专门作好安排。

example.ex: There are very generous provisions for the mother.
example.tran: 这位母亲在物质上得到了很好的赡养。

entry.tran: （法律或协议的）条文，条款，规定
entry.def: A provision in a law or an agreement is an arrangement which is included in it.

example.ex: He backed a provision that would allow judges to delay granting a divorce decree in some cases...
example.tran: 他赞成一项允许法官在一些情况下延迟作出离婚判决的法律条款。

example.ex: The bill's provision for the sale and purchase of land faces stiff opposition from conservatives.
example.tran: 该法案关于土地买卖的规定遭到保守派的强硬反对。

example.ex: On board were enough provisions for two weeks.
example.tran: 船上有足够两周吃的食物。

means.word_mean: 2. the activity of supplying or providing something
3. the cognitive process of thinking about what you will do in the event of something happening;

sentences.sentence: "his planning for retirement was hindered by several uncertainties"

means.word_mean: 4. a store or supply of something (especially of food or clothing or arms)

stems_affixes.word_buile: di分开+vis分开+ible能……的→adj.可分的
advise建议+able能……的→adj.可取的, 明智的
advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]+ory……的→adj.劝告的
provision预备+al……的→预备的,临时的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 看得见的, 明显的, 显著的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+ible能……的→adj.看得见的, 明显的, 显著的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有远见的,有洞察力的;空想的

vis看,查+ual……的→adj.看的,看得见的;视觉的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 装置, 设计, 图案, 策略, 发明物, 设备
stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开+vice=vis分开→分离出→想出

advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]→ n.忠告,建议;告知
advise建议+or人→advisor顾问

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,[一批]供应品;预备;条款;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vis看,查+ion表名词→供应;预备
revise[v.修订,校订;修正,修改]+ion表名词→n.修改,修订

vis看,查+a→看过了的,查过了的→允许入境

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拜访, 访问, 游览, 参观
stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+it走→边走边看→游览

stems_affixes.value_cn: 设计;发明;图谋;作出[计划];想出[办法]
stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开+vis分开+e→分离出→想出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知

pre预先+vis看,查+e→v.预知,预先警告
re再+vis看,查+e→再看→修正

super在上面+vis看+e→在上面看→临视

Sentence.sentence: It is these commercial provisions that are proving the settlement's most controversial aspect.
The commercial provisions of the settlement
To avoid fiscal (财政) meltdown, public pensions and health-care provision will have to be reined back severely and taxes may have to go up.

means.word_mean: 供应, 提供, 供给

sentences.en: The government is responsible for the provision of education for all the children.
sentences.cn: 政府有责任向所有儿童提供教育。

sentences.en: He made no provision against the unforeseen expenses.
The campers got their provisions at the village shop.
sentences.cn: 野营者在乡村商店买食物。

means.word_mean: 规定, 条款, 条件

sentences.en: They failed to carry out the provisions.
sentences.cn: 他们没有按照规定办事。

jushi.english: The government is responsible for the provision of education for all the children.
jushi.chinese: 政府有责任向所有儿童提供教育。

jushi.english: They bought along a provision of cargoes.
The campers got their provisions at the village shop.
jushi.chinese: 野营者在乡村商店买食物。
